r.s: An interceptor to control the access to resources which can be accessed only by authenticated users
r.d: An interceptor to control the access to resources which can be accessed only by authenticated users
r.n:
A new release of Piece_Unity_Component_Authentication is now available. If you have used Piece_Unity_Component_Authentication 1.1.2, you *must* upgrade to this version.
What's New in Piece_Unity_Component_Authentication 1.1.3
* A defect fix: - A defect has been fixed that redirection to the requested URI to be failed if the URI contains query variables. (Ticket #293)
